input.sentences: everyone was coming over to the apartment for a halloween party .
we had made a great halloween spread out of delicious snacks .
everyone arrived and started having a great time .
everybody was fully decked out in halloween costumes .
i was so happy that everyone had an awesome time .
output.sentences: My friend from college was throwing a halloween party.
It included all types of ghoulish delights.
And a few other ghouls too.
Here I am with my old roommate.
